meanings.definition: a dish consisting of layers of pasta, cheese, and meat or vegetables
meanings.sent1: My mom made delicious lasagnas for dinner last night.
meanings.sent2: I ordered lasagnas at the Italian restaurant and it was amazing.
meanings.sent3: The lasagnas at the potluck disappeared within minutes!
meanings.sent4: Her life was like a stack of lasagnas, with each layer representing a different challenge.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked lasagnas filled the kitchen.

meanings.sent1: We brought two lasagnas to the party to share with everyone.
meanings.sent2: The menu listed various lasagnas, including vegetarian options.
meanings.sent3: The lasagnas on the buffet table looked like a colorful mountain range.
meanings.sent4: The lasagnas in the display window tempted passersby with their cheesy goodness.
meanings.sent5: The chef prepared the lasagnas with precision and care.
